mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT comm_no, board_no, user_id, content, post_date, delete_status, board_cate FROM commTb where board_cate = 2 AND board_no = #{boardNo } ORDER BY post_date ) B ) ORDER BY rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commTB ( comm_no, board_no, user_id, content, board_cate ) VALUES ( comm_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{userId}, #{content}, 2 )
